review.title: “After five years of stellar effort, laid off without a care.”
review.pros: Pros – Wonderful group of conscientious staff demonstrating self reliance and loyalty to the best interests of the company and the customers they serve.
review.cons: Cons – Branch and Corporate management with no concept of fostering a "team" environment or sense of shared responsibility for the overall success of the organization.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Recognize and accept the full responsibility that employees should not be viewed as just another physical asset to be added and removed like equipment and inventory.
